title: Blawpaw
author: Blawpaw
content: I have decided to host my own Tips Post, so I will be posting my soccer tips for the weekends. I usually follow some guys who have around 300% annual profit from soccer betting. My strategy is to check what are their picks and then do my own research along with my knowledge about soccer and come up with my own tips. Each week I'll be posting tips. Afterwards, I'll post the results and present simple statistics. This way, in a few weeks you guys will be able to check my winning ratio and then decide if you should take my tips or not. So, without further ado let's head on for the TIPS!This Saturday Tips - 05\10\22Switzerland - Super LeagueSaint Gallen - Grasshopper - 05\10\22Both teams scoreGreece - Super LeagueAtromitos - Aris Salónica - 05\10\22Both teams scoreRepública Checa - Czech LigaViktoria Plzeň - Sparta Praga - 05\10\22Viktoria Plzeň to winTurkey - Super LigaGalatasaray - Besiktas - 05\10\22Both teams scoreBelgium - Pro LeagueCercle Brugge - OHL - 05\10\22Cercle Brugge to winBelgium - Pro LeagueSeraing Sint-Truiden - 05\10\22Over 2,5 goalsEngland- Premier LeagueEverton - Leicester - 05\10\22Both teams scoreGermany - BundesligaBremen - Schalke 04 - 05\10\22Over 2,5 GoalsSpain - Primera DivisiónCelta Vigo - Osasuna - 05\10\22Over 2,5 goalsIsrael - Ligat ha'AlAshdod - Hapoel TA - 05\10\22Both teams scoreIm pretty sure these will go above 50% winning rate easily!

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: I'm into sportsbetting but not in soccer, but I do sometimes watch games of such with my colleagues since they are into it. Howver, I like to gamble on weekends which somehow pinches my interest, so I kinda want to try these 'tips' as a start.Quote from: Blawpaw on November 05, 2022, 01:41:46 PMI have decided to host my own Tips Post, so I will be posting my soccer tips for the weekends. I usually follow some guys who have around 300% annual profit from soccer betting. My strategy is to check what are their picks and then do my own research along with my knowledge about soccer and come up with my own tips. Each week I'll be posting tips. Afterwards, I'll post the results and present simple statistics. This way, in a few weeks you guys will be able to check my winning ratio and then decide if you should take my tips or not. So, without further ado let's head on for the TIPS!This Saturday Tips - 05\10\22Switzerland - Super LeagueSaint Gallen - Grasshopper - 05\10\22Both teams scoreGreece - Super LeagueAtromitos - Aris Salónica - 05\10\22Both teams scoreRepública Checa - Czech LigaViktoria Plzeň - Sparta Praga - 05\10\22Viktoria Plzeň to winTurkey - Super LigaGalatasaray - Besiktas - 05\10\22Both teams scoreBelgium - Pro LeagueCercle Brugge - OHL - 05\10\22Cercle Brugge to winBelgium - Pro LeagueSeraing Sint-Truiden - 05\10\22Over 2,5 goalsEngland- Premier LeagueEverton - Leicester - 05\10\22Both teams scoreGermany - BundesligaBremen - Schalke 04 - 05\10\22Over 2,5 GoalsSpain - Primera DivisiónCelta Vigo - Osasuna - 05\10\22Over 2,5 goalsIsrael - Ligat ha'AlAshdod - Hapoel TA - 05\10\22Both teams scoreIm pretty sure these will go above 50% winning rate easily!I have few questions; are those dates? 'coz I think those are not updated or something? Also you have mentioned about statistics, I think I'd be more convinced once you have posted it in this thread to support what you are trying to promote by this topic. But I'll also ask my friends about their take on your predictions. Will do my part as well to check on some of their games to gain more insight of how this field of sportsbetting work, I guess.

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: We know, the English Premier League is a hot league right now, but why do you only have 1 bet on that league? How about 1 game today, what is the right bet for Fulham vs City. City are the big favourites but betting on the money line on City isn't that exciting, so what's your advice?

comments.author: Queentoshi
comments.body: For sports bettors, people who bet on soccer, I am sure that they will first observe your tips and predictions for games say starting from the games you have posted already this weekend and next weekend to see how accurate you can be. Also since it has the ability to become a mega thread, If a couple of persons start posting their own tips based on their reasons and it is conflicting with another persons tips, it can become confusing.

comments.author: panjul07
comments.body: It will be better if you can provide the odds of each selection and maybe a total odds if you make all into a parlay bet. Also, once all the bets are settled, you can update your own tip so we can see your statistic. It is very common thing done by most other tipsters, good stats will make you popular and maybe there will be a chance for you to be paid tipster in the future. One more thing, we are in November already but you write "10" which refers to October.

comments.author: Blawpaw
comments.body: Quote from: Strongkored on November 05, 2022, 02:29:06 PMWe know, the English Premier League is a hot league right now, but why do you only have 1 bet on that league? How about 1 game today, what is the right bet for Fulham vs City. City are the big favourites but betting on the money line on City isn't that exciting, so what's your advice?In addition to the Manchester club presenting an absolutely incredible squad, it still faces an “enemy” that presents some weaknesses in all processes. It is important to note that Manchester City has a difficult game in the middle of the week, against Chelsea, counting for the FA Cup, that is, they should want to gain a good advantage to then manage.Given that, The most likely scenario for this match will be Manchester City winning at half-time.

comments.author: Blawpaw
comments.body: Quote from: panjul07 on November 05, 2022, 03:05:44 PMIt will be better if you can provide the odds of each selection and maybe a total odds if you make all into a parlay bet. Also, once all the bets are settled, you can update your own tip so we can see your statistic. It is very common thing done by most other tipsters, good stats will make you popular and maybe there will be a chance for you to be paid tipster in the future. One more thing, we are in November already but you write "10" which refers to October.   The thing here is that I'm not looking for the best odds (or, I'm looking for the best odds at different betting operators for this specific bet), rather I'm looking to find the most probable outcome and still make some money out of it, so in a sense, the odds don't matter that much...The final goal is to increase my Bankroll.

comments.author: Blawpaw
comments.body: Quote from: Blawpaw on November 05, 2022, 01:41:46 PMLast Saturday's Tip Results - 05\10\22Switzerland - Super LeagueFinal ResultSaint Gallen 2 - Grasshopper 1Both teams score - Got this rightGreece - Super LeagueFinal Result Atromitos - 0 Aris Salónica - 0 05\10\22Both teams score - Got this Wrong República Checa - Czech LigaFinal Result Viktoria Plzeň 0 - Sparta Praga 1 - 05\10\22Viktoria Plzeň to win - Got this wrongTurkey - Super LigaFinal Result Galatasaray 2 - Besiktas 1 - 05\10\22Both teams score - Got this rightBelgium - Pro LeagueFinal Result Cercle Brugge 2- OHL - 1 05\10\22Cercle Brugge to win - Got this rightBelgium - Pro LeagueFinal Result Seraing 1 - Sint-Truiden 2 - 05\10\22Over 2,5 goals - Got this rightEngland- Premier LeagueFinal Result Everton 0 - Leicester 2 - 05\10\22Both teams score - Got this wrongGermany - BundesligaFinal Result Bremen 2- Schalke 04 1 - 05\10\22Over 2,5 Goals - Got this rightSpain - Primera DivisiónFinal Result Celta Vigo 1 - Osasuna 2 - 05\10\22Over 2,5 goals - Got this rightIsrael - Ligat ha'AlFinal result Ashdod 1 - Hapoel TA 0 - 05\10\22Both teams score - Got this wrongSo, it seems that with 10 tips given, I got 6 of them right while ended up missing 4. This means that I still get out with some profit as I hit 60% of the tips proposed. I guess these are awful results as I was planning to hit at least 7 of the 10 Tips. Even so, I have managed to get out and still see an increase in my BankrollSimple Math:10 Tips6 - Tips won 4 - Tips Lost Winning rate of 60%

comments.author: alegotardo
comments.body: Quote from: Blawpaw on November 05, 2022, 01:41:46 PMI have decided to host my own Tips Post, so I will be posting my soccer tips for the weekends. I usually follow some guys who have around 300% annual profit from soccer betting. My strategy is to check what are their picks and then do my own research along with my knowledge about soccer and come up with my own tips. Each week I'll be posting tips. Afterwards, I'll post the results and present simple statistics. This way, in a few weeks you guys will be able to check my winning ratio and then decide if you should take my tips or not.I value and admire a lot when I see that reputable bettors like you decide to publish their bets.Certainly many bettors are inspired by posts like this to form opinions for their own bets, so it takes courage and responsibility to make this type of publication.Obviously you can't be held responsible for these tips, but even so, it's something that in one way or another messes with your reputation.I hope you make good bets, and regardless of the result, that you keep posting the tips for many weeks to come.Good luck!

comments.body: FINAL RESULTSAustria - BundesligaRapid Viena 1 - LASK 0  Above 2,5 Goals - Got this wrongFrança - Ligue 1Lille 1 - Rennes 1 Both teams to score - Got this rightCroatia - 1. HNLDinamo Zagreb 3 - Šibenik 0 under 3.5 Goals - Got this rightGermany - BundesligaFreiburg 2 - Colonia 0  Freiburg to Win - Got this rightPoland - EkstraklasaLech 3 - Kielce 2 Both teams score - Got this rightEngland - Premier LeagueTottenham 1 - Liverpool 2Both teams score - Got this rightDenmark - Super LeagueOdense 1 - Brondby 1 Above 2,5 Goals - Got this wrongItaly - Serie ARoma 0 - Lazio 1Both teams score - Goth this wrongTurkey - Super LeagueTrabzon 2 - Konya 2 Under 2,5 Goals - Got this wrongCzech - Czech LeagueSlavia Praga 3 - Baník 1Slavia to win - Got this rightSimple Math:10 Tips6 - Tips won4 - Tips LostWinning rate of 60%This time I kept the same result as before. My goal was to reach at least a 70% winning rate, but unfortunately, I kept the 60% winning rate once again. Let's hope next week I can improve my results.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: 60 percent win rate is a good score if it will be consistent, I think you are already doing great even though you are just starting out on this, this will help a lot of people including myself who eager to start betting on sports but don't know where to start from, I will be following this thread from now on and i will be here next weekend for the tips.Like I said early, 60 percent win rate that is consistent is a good score, I don't know about other users, maybe I feel this way because I am new to sports betting, but at least, it is far better than nothing at all.

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: @Blawpaw 60% win is pretty good and single bet is less risky than multibet which can give a bigger win with a big risk of losing too. Can you also include the odds on each bet you choose so at least so we can see the 6 bets you win are bets with high, medium or low odds.

comments.author: QueenVera
comments.created_time: November 07, 2022, 05:30:49 AMLast edit: November 08, 2022, 09:47:29 AM by QueenVera
comments.body: Quote from: Blawpaw on November 05, 2022, 03:16:56 PMQuote from: panjul07 on November 05, 2022, 03:05:44 PMIt will be better if you can provide the odds of each selection and maybe a total odds if you make all into a parlay bet. Also, once all the bets are settled, you can update your own tip so we can see your statistic. It is very common thing done by most other tipsters, good stats will make you popular and maybe there will be a chance for you to be paid tipster in the future. One more thing, we are in November already but you write "10" which refers to October.   The thing here is that I'm not looking for the best odds (or, I'm looking for the best odds at different betting operators for this specific bet), rather I'm looking to find the most probable outcome and still make some money out of it, so in a sense, the odds don't matter that much...The final goal is to increase my Bankroll.Your games looks really interesting to me and I think those who are in soccer gambling might also find this interesting too.But I do hope you also take note of the dates as we are already in November but your date stated 10 which implies you were referring to October.Please try as much as possible to monitor your thread to avoid spams.While posting this games, I do hope you post the odds as well and also do well to post the outcome as this singular act will increase people's trust in your predictions

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: I'm not really know with the other league since I only know about Premier League and Serie A. Quote from: Blawpaw on November 06, 2022, 08:42:17 PMSimple Math:10 Tips6 - Tips won4 - Tips LostWinning rate of 60%It's doesn't accurate to count the outcome based on the percentage of your prediction, if you only predict favorite club or pick a betting option that has higher chance to happen that has low odds, it's easy. You need to count based on the odds you won and the possible odds you can get, if the odds you won aren't at least reach 50% of the possible odds, we can say your winning rate is lower than 50%.Quote from: Blawpaw on November 05, 2022, 01:41:46 PMIm pretty sure these will go above 50% winning rate easily!Let's see what will happen, don't delete your thread regardless the outcome and always be consistent to create soccer tips every weekend

comments.author: Bitinity
comments.body: Quote from: Plaguedeath on November 07, 2022, 06:16:25 AMIt's doesn't accurate to count the outcome based on the percentage of your prediction, if you only predict favorite club or pick a betting option that has higher chance to happen that has low odds, it's easy. You need to count based on the odds you won and the possible odds you can get, if the odds you won aren't at least reach 50% of the possible odds, we can say your winning rate is lower than 50%.Agreed, winning rate in sports betting should be based on the odds as well as from the bet amount. It will be useless to have 6 wins out of 10 but the odds for the 6 correct picks were just low. Simple example, his 6 win bets were with odds 1.5 and lets say he place all bets with same stake ($1). It means that he spent $10 and his return was 1.5*6 = $9, so mathematically he lost $1 from the 10 bets. In this situation, his winning rate is negative.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: Quote from: Blawpaw on November 06, 2022, 08:42:17 PMThis time I kept the same result as before. My goal was to reach at least a 70% winning rate, but unfortunately, I kept the 60% winning rate once again. Let's hope next week I can improve my results.you have to start posting the games you are making predictions along with the odds, only then will it be possible to know if you are making a profit. because out of 10 bets, if all 10 bets have odds of @1.10 if you hit 6 bets you won't be making a profit, even if you say you were 60% correct, in sports betting when the person makes game bets with odds of @1.50 or less in the long run will not be profitable, I realized that making single bets hardly become profitable in the long run, making multiple bets gives more profit, I know the risk is greater but when a person manages to hit a multiple bet that contains many games the person they get a bigger profit that it takes time for the person to lose all the bankroll if he has good management and in the long run it becomes very profitable, but to do that the person needs to dominate the games he bets on

comments.author: Blawpaw
comments.body: ok, so I see that many of you want me to post the odds I'm using to bet so that this can be as much as assertive as it can. Next weekend I'll be posting some new tips and I'll try to remember to add the odds Im bettin in.

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: Will you give some weekly tips for the upcoming FIFA World Cup? I think that will be more interesting to have since a lot are expecting to bet in this huge soccer competition in the world, everyone is exciting as well for this. 60% win rate is high I guess to risk a small amount of what I will bet on soccer, I'm more into basketball though.

comments.author: Maestro75
comments.body: 60% win rate is still above average and that is profit for anyone achieving that. You got it twice and if that continues this thread is about to be flooded with excitement from soccer bettors. But I found out that there is no inclusion of any league in Africa in your predictions. Is there any reason you skipped that?
